resources.string: Long press on item to add to favorites.
Long press on item to remove from favorites.

string-array.name: s_best
string-array.item: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don\’t matter and those who matter don\’t mind.
There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one\’s definition of your life; define yourself
Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted, in spite of your changing moods.
We are all part of the ultimate statistic – ten out of ten die
Life\’s too mysterious to take too seriously.
The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has been before
You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
If opportunity doesn\’t knock, build a door.
You can\’t go around building a better world for people. Only people can build a better world for people. Otherwise, it\’s just a cage.

string-array.name: s_cool
string-array.item: “I swear this life is like the sweetest thing I\’ve ever known.” - Drake, "Over"
“I hope you never lose your sense of wonder.” - Lee Ann Womack, "I Hope You Dance"
“But if you close your eyes, does it almost feel like nothing\’s changed at all? - Bastille, "Pompeii"
“You may say I\’m a dreamer, but I\’m not the only one.” - John Lennon, "Imagine"
“You can\’t choose what stays and what fades away.” - Florence + The Machine, "No Light, No Light"
“She acts like summer and walks like rain.” - Train, "Drops of Jupiter
“She\’s a good girl, loves her mama. Loves Jesus, and America too.” - Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, "Free Fallin\’"
“Lights will guide you home, and ignite your bones.” - Coldplay, "Fix You"
